title.rendered: Happy Holidays from AVA: Let it Snow!

content.rendered: Our enewsletter with a snowy, holiday greeting went out last week. Read it here and see some sweet shots of the AVA family. It’s also not too late to take advantage of our 25% rafting discount! Expires Dec 31.
